channel.title: Requirements for a Item

item.title: Requirements for a Item
item.dc:creator: @JCor9 JCor9
item.description:
@JCor9 wrote:

So i added the new zammy gs model and renamed it to “death godsword” i want it to require 85 atk and 75 def so i added this

ItemAssistant.java

if(itemName.contains("death")) { if(itemName.contains("godsword")) { c.attackLevelReq = 85; } else { c.defenceLevelReq = 75; } }
Hope someone can help

Read full topic
